18.tilte: PPSC Jobs 10/2020: 366+ Jr Clerks, Zilladar, Teaching Faculty & Other in Punjab Government Departments
18.discription:
Punjab Public Service Commission (PPSC) Jobs 10/2020: PPSC is inviting applications from eligible candidates for 366+ Jr Clerks, Zilladar, Teaching Faculty & Other in Punjab Government Departments in Lahore and other districts. Required qualification from a recognized institution, relevant work experience and age limit requirement are as following. The vacancies at PPSC announced today are Jr Clerks, Zilladar, Teaching Faculty & Registrars in Punjab Board of Revenue, Specialized Healthcare & Medical Education Department and Punjab Irrigation Department.
Eligible candidates are encouraged to apply online on PPSC website at www.ppsc.gop.pk on or before the due date of 30th March 2020. Incomplete, late, hand written submissions/applications will not be entertained. Only shortlisted candidates will be called for written test/interview.
